name: LTD.INC - Guido Di Salle - Multiple Editions

metadata.name: Sicilian Kiss LTD
metadata.description:
When asked to describe the Sicilian Kiss; Guido responded:

"The Sicilian Kiss wasn’t created as a collection, it was made to be a story. A story of innovation and opportunity. The end isn’t written, it evolves as this space and I do. This step is just the next chapter in the story."

This 50 edition Guido X LTD.INC physical + digital photography collection is that next chapter of the Sicilian Kiss story. 

This LTD.INC artwork has been created with the highest quality museum grade materials and infused with NFC technology.

When scanned using the LTD.INC app collectors are provided with instant access to proof of authenticity, provenance, exclusive content by Guido and future access to IRL/digital experiences.

LTD.INC offers an elevated and interactive brand and product experience while merging the physical and digital worlds.

Invest in Culture.
